meanings.definition: A person who bets on horse races.
meanings.sent1: The horseplayers eagerly studied the horses before placing their bets.
meanings.sent2: Many horseplayers enjoy spending time at the racetrack, hoping to pick a winning horse.
meanings.sent3: The horseplayers joked about their lucky charms bringing them good fortune at the races.
meanings.sent4: In the world of horse racing, the horseplayers are like strategists, analyzing every detail to make the right choice.
meanings.sent5: The horseplayers' excitement reached a peak as the race was about to begin.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in horse racing as a hobby or profession.
meanings.sent1: The horseplayers trained hard every day to prepare for the upcoming race.
meanings.sent2: As horseplayers, they dedicated their lives to the sport, striving to become champions.
meanings.sent3: The horseplayers shared stories of their most memorable races around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: To the horseplayers, the racetrack was their battlefield, where they showcased their skills and determination.
meanings.sent5: The horseplayers' love for horses and racing was evident in every race they competed in.
